rev.desc.rev.desc: Cannot save Process Designer settings record and see rad errors.
use setvariables and getvariables to avoid too many parse/evaluate call which cause performance issue.
update start panel, add jscall("debugUtils.log")
Remove support for the benchmark utility
cblanck: on panel check.baseMethod, change the condition from
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "upadte", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
to
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "update", "delete","save"} and $L.exit="normal"
Without 'save' some records weren't getting saved. Including 'save' and 'update' covers both bases
Hua: on panel check.baseMethod, change the condition from
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "save", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
to
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "update", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
since in Process record, the value is set as update
Story: 26536 - Enhanced Application Framework (EAF)
45871 - merge EAF code to Henry branch
Task: 46242 - DEV: load in eafDocEngine unload
Panel: run.post.exp
Changed the exit from:
check.benchmark
To:
check.baseMethod
Added the following panels:
call.addl.process
check.baseMethod
run.base.method
run.base.method.1
run.base.method.2
DE3602 Useing more reliable same call to check for null in $L.file.save and adding null check for $L.file in run.rad.pre.exp
On panel run.pre.exp there was an index() statement that needed to have >0 put at the end of it.
Rally Defect DE918 invalid number of parameters... Saved call.rad.1 and recompiled.
no changes. Temporarily entered a debug line that I removed.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
Modified so that if a Process calls additional Process records, the *last* record called is the one checked for the "Run Standard Process when Complete" flag.
updated the call.rad.1 panel to include the ability to pass 5 more parameters from a Process record.
BUG11582 (devtx):
modified the run.pre.exp and run.post.exp panels to reference the new javascript fields:
javascript.pre and javascript.post
Added a specific error message when a RAD condition can't be evaluated.
Added line to the 'run.pre.exp' and 'run.post.exp' panels to evalaute any javascript defined in the process record
Added $INTO.FILE=$L.file to the cleanup panel.

Added a $G.debug.process flag, that when true will cause messages to be written to the log (sc.log) when the process is entered and exited. Messages are scmessages that contain the process name and the record tag (filename;unique id), so they can be tailored as well.
Added new abilities to save cursor position and run process in a window.
Added ability to save cursor position.
Added the following condition to line 1 of check.benchmark panel:
or $L.process.name=$G.benchmark.process
Added code in the stop.clock panel to properly populate the id field.

descript.descript: Cannot save Process Designer settings record and see rad errors.
use setvariables and getvariables to avoid too many parse/evaluate call which cause performance issue.
update start panel, add jscall("debugUtils.log")
Remove support for the benchmark utility
cblanck: on panel check.baseMethod, change the condition from
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "upadte", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
to
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "update", "delete","save"} and $L.exit="normal"
Without 'save' some records weren't getting saved. Including 'save' and 'update' covers both bases
Hua: on panel check.baseMethod, change the condition from
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "save", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
to
baseMethod in $L.process={"add", "update", "delete"} and $L.exit="normal"
since in Process record, the value is set as update

On panel run.pre.exp there was an index() statement that needed to have >0 put at the end of it.
Rally Defect DE918 invalid number of parameters... Saved call.rad.1 and recompiled.
no changes. Temporarily entered a debug line that I removed.
Removed call to obsolete function current.window()
Modified so that if a Process calls additional Process records, the *last* record called is the one checked for the "Run Standard Process when Complete" flag.
updated the call.rad.1 panel to include the ability to pass 5 more parameters from a Process record.
BUG11582 (devtx):
modified the run.pre.exp and run.post.exp panels to reference the new javascript fields:
javascript.pre and javascript.post

Added line to the 'run.pre.exp' and 'run.post.exp' panels to evalaute any javascript defined in the process record
Added $INTO.FILE=$L.file to the cleanup panel.

Added a $G.debug.process flag, that when true will cause messages to be written to the log (sc.log) when the process is entered and exited. Messages are scmessages that contain the process name and the record tag (filename;unique id), so they can be tailored as well.
Added new abilities to save cursor position and run process in a window.
Added ability to save cursor position.
Added the following condition to line 1 of check.benchmark panel:
or $L.process.name=$G.benchmark.process
Added code in the stop.clock panel to properly populate the id field.
